tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_reviews (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
	feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	reviewer_id INT,
	feedback_text TEXT,
	date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
	review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	employee_id INT,
	rating INT,
	comment TEXT,
	date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  review_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  remote BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID,
    review_date DATE,
    review_text TEXT,
    reviewer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE Employee
(
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback
(
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview
(
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE ReviewComments
(
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    review_id INT,
    commenter_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Department
(
    department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    department_name VARCHAR(50),
    manager_id INT
)
